description: Arc Raiders, the upcoming third-person extraction shooter from Embark Studios, combines some of the best ideas of the genre with that hard-to-pin-down online experience to cut through the crowd and stand out.
title: Arc Raiders Playtest Impressions: This Tense, Immersive Extraction Shooter Could Be the Next Multiplayer Hit

description: Garmin Venu X1 launched in India as the latest premium smartwatch by Garmin. It has a 2-inch AMOLED touchscreen display with Always-On mode. The smartwatch has a built-in LED flashlight. It is said to last up to eight days on a single charge in smartwatch mode. The wearable supports more than 100 preloaded sports apps. It has health and fitness sensors to track blood oxygen saturation, heart rate, respiratory rate, sleep and more.
title: Garmin Venu X1 With 2-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to Eight Days of Battery Life Launched in India

description: Google says its new Willow quantum chip has achieved a major breakthrough, solving a previously unsolvable algorithm 13,000 times faster than classical supercomputers. The 105-qubit chip powers Google’s quantum supercomputer and achieved record-low error rates. The feat, detailed in Nature, offers verifiable proof of quantum computing’s potential for real-world problem-solving.
title: Google Says Its Willow Chip Hit Major Quantum Computing Milestone, Solves Algorithm 13,000X Faster

description: Instagram is reportedly testing a new feature called Restyle Text, which lets users create custom fonts through natural language prompts. Built on Meta AI, it expands the existing Restyle tool that already allows AI-based photo and video edits. Users can also choose from presets like Chrome or Balloon to give their Stories unique, AI-generated visual flair.
title: Instagram Is Reportedly Testing AI-Powered Restyle Text for Stories and Edits App

description: Apple's upcoming smartphone lineup could be powered by the A20 series chipsets, built on a 2nm process, according to a tipster. If this is true, it would mark a shift from the current 3nm chipsets, dubbed A19 and A19 Pro, which are seen on the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. Next year's iPhone 18 lineup and iPhone Fold could be the first phones to be powered by the rumoured 2nm A20 and A20 Pro chipsets.
title: iPhone 18 Series, Apple's First Foldable iPhone Tipped to Feature Company's First 2nm A20 Chip

description: Earlier this month, Lava teased the launch of Lava Agni 4 in India. The smartphone is confirmed to debut next month. Now, the unannounced phone has reportedly received certification from the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website. The listing reveals the model number of the phone. It could run on a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset and feature a dual rear camera unit.
title: Lava Agni 4 5G Listed on BIS Website a Month Ahead of Launch in India

description: OnePlus 15 and OnePlus Ace 6 will launch in China on October 27. While the latter's arrival in India is uncertain, the flagship OnePlus 15 is confirmed to be unveiled in India soon. Although OnePlus has yet to announce the exact India launch date for the phone, a tech blogger has shared the same in a social media post. The handset will be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, paired with a 7,300mAh battery. It will carry a redesigned square triple-rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel shooter.
title: OnePlus 15 Global Launch Date Leaked Alongside New Accessories: Check Expected Price, Features

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is expected to be announced next year. The official launch date is still under wraps, but ahead of it, case and accessory maker Thinborne has listed its Galaxy S26 Ultra case online, hinting at the phone's design. The listing hints at Qi2 wireless charging support. The case is said to be made of  600D Aramid Fibre material.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Case Listings Hint at Design, Qi2 Magnetic Charging Support

description: Samsung is said to be testing the next iteration dubbed One UI 8.5, following the wider rollout of Android 16-based One UI 8 in recent weeks,. According to a recent report, the South Korean tech conglomerate is developing a new feature to help prioritise certain notifications on Galaxy smartphones. The feature’s description further reveals that the notification content will be processed on the smartphone, which indicates that it may not make use of the cloud for data processing or storage.
title: Samsung Said to Be Developing 'Prioritise Notifications' Feature for Galaxy Phones With One UI 8.5

description: WazirX has resumed trading after over a year, starting a phased rollout from October 24 with zero trading fees for 30 days. Industry leaders called the move a defining moment for India’s crypto sector, noting it could help restore investor trust. Some users have reported withdrawal delays, though WazirX previously outlined a 10-day timeline for complete access.
title: WazirX Reopens Trading Over a Year After Hack, Crypto Exchange to Restart in Phased Manner

description: Google is expanding its Gemini AI assistant to more Android devices, officially replacing Google Assistant. Users are being notified via email, which also outlines how their data is handled. Gemini offers conversational interactions, app integration, and live assistance via screen sharing and video calls. However, Google clarifies that chats and activity data may be reviewed for training, but can be turned off.
title: How to Ensure Data Safety With Gemini AI Assistant, Google Explains

description: ISRO has completed 90 percent of the Gaganyaan mission’s development. With three test flights ahead, India is set to join the elite group of nations capable of sending humans to space by 2027, marking a landmark step in its space exploration journey.
title: ISRO Says Gaganyaan Mission Is 90 Percent Complete, Aiming for 2027 Launch

description: Saturn’s moon Titan has shocked scientists by breaking a key chemistry rule. NASA and Chalmers University researchers found that polar and nonpolar molecules, usually immiscible, can mix under Titan’s extreme cold. The discovery deepens our understanding of prebiotic chemistry and could reveal how life’s building blocks form in frigid extraterrestrial environments.
title: Saturn’s Moon Titan Breaks One of Chemistry’s Oldest Rules, NASA Study Reveals

description: A team of scientists has created a microscopic engine made from a 5-micrometre glass bead suspended in an electric field. By applying oscillating voltages, the bead moves as if it’s in an environment of 13 million°C, even though it remains cool. The study reveals bizarre thermodynamic effects at tiny scales, offering clues to how natural molecular “machines” work inside living cells.
title: Scientists Construct 5-Micron Engine Generating Effective Heat of 13 Million Degrees Celsius Without Burning

description: A new “mechanochemical” process allows the recycling of Teflon by grinding it with sodium metal at room temperature. This solvent-free reaction breaks down Teflon’s carbon-fluorine bonds, producing harmless carbon and sodium fluoride instead of toxic PFAS. The sodium fluoride can be reused in fluorine-based products, making this approach a breakthrough for sustainable plastic recycling and circular fluorine chemistry.
title: Scientists Develop Eco-Friendly Method to Break Down and Reuse Teflon Plastic

description: Bethesda announced Fallout 4 Anniversary Edition on Thursday during the Fallout Day broadcast. The new edition, which includes the base game, all six expansions, and creation club content, will release on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox on November 10. The game will launch on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026.
title: Bethesda Announces Fallout 4 Anniversary Edition, Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Set for 2026

description: Google has announced waiting rooms in Google Meet. The new feature lets users create a virtual space where participants can wait until the host allows them into the meeting. With this update, hosts will get more control over who enters and leaves the meeting. It helps protect the privacy of participants.
title: How to Create a Google Meet Waiting Room for Better Control, Privacy

description: Oppo Reno 15 series' key specifications have surfaced online, hinting at what the lineup could offer. The lineup is expected to feature an Oppo Reno 15 and a Reno 15 Pro Max. The company could also unveil a model with a 6.59-inch display as the of the Reno 15 series. The Reno 15 Pro Max, which was earlier tipped to feature a Dimensity 9400 SoC, is now expected to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Tipped to Feature Dimensity 8450 SoC, 200-Megapixel Rear Camera

description: Starlink is gearing up to launch its satellite communication services in India. The Elon Musk-owned company is readying its infrastructure in anticipation of the launch, and it plans to establish nine gateway earth stations in major cities such as Lucknow, Mumbai, and Noida, across the country, according to a report. So far, Starlink has been permitted to import 100 terminals for testing only fixed satellite services, as part of stringent conditions imposed on it to prevent any misuse.
title: Starlink Reportedly Plans Nine Gateway Earth Stations Across India to Relay Internet Traffic

description: US President Donald Trump has pardoned Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, following his 2023 guilty plea over anti-money-laundering violations. The decision lifts restrictions that had prevented CZ from operating financial ventures, allowing him to re-engage with Binance and the wider crypto ecosystem. Zhao and Binance welcomed the move, framing it as a step toward innovation, fairness, and advancing Web3, while critics raised concerns over potential conflicts of interest and broader implications for cryptocurrency regulation in the US.
title: US President Donald Trump Pardons Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao, Lifts Restrictions

description: Blackmail is a Tamil drama with an intense and emotional background score, to be released on the OTT platform Sun NXT from October 30.
title: Blackmail OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch G.V. Prakash Starrer Movie Online

description: Hedda is an American Drama movie that is based on the classic stage drama, Hedda Gabler, by Henrik Ibsen. The movie follows a young, manipulative woman who is trapped in a loveless marriage.
title: Hedda OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Classic American Drama Online?

description: OnePlus Ace 6 will launch on October 27 in China as the successor to last year's OnePlus Ace 5. However, the phone is rumoured to debut globally with the OnePlus 15R branding. The pre-orders for the upcoming handset are now open. The phone will be offered in three colourways. It will ship with last year's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, Android 16-based ColorOS 16, and a dual-rear camera unit. It will pack a 7,800mAh battery with 120W wired fast charging support, too.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Chipset, Camera Specifications Revealed as Pre-Orders Open in China

description: Param Sundari, starring Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor, is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video. The film explores cross-cultural love, modern romance, and family humor in a refreshing yet simple narrative.
title: Param Sundari Starring Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor Now Available on Prime Video

description: Cybersecurity researchers have discovered a potential threat linked to a "privacy friendly" browser. Dubbed the Universe Browser, it is said to route its connections through servers in China and quietly installs several programs that covertly run in the background. The cybersecurity firm discovered that it was linked to a network of illegal gaming websites and cybercrime groups that operate in Cambodia
title: ‘Privacy Friendly’ Universe Browser Behaves Like Malware With Keylogging and Disabled Security Tools, Warn Researchers

description: They Call Me OG is a Telugu action thriller movie that is now streaming on Netflix. The film explores the themes of rivalry, friendship, and survival.
title: They Call Him OG Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch Pawan Kalyan Starrer Action Movie

description: Assassin's Creed Shadows is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 on December 2, Ubisoft has confirmed. The game will launch on the console with touch screen features, cross progression support via Ubisoft Connect, and all recent post-launch updates and free content drops, except for the Claws of Awaji expansion.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Launches on Nintendo Switch 2 on December 2

description: The Apple iPhone 16 Plus becomes an interesting, yet affordable iPhone option for those looking for a bigger display and better battery life as the iPhone 17 moves further up in terms of price and justifies it by bringing new features. Meanwhile, there’s plenty to choose from on the Android side of things, with the Google Pixel 10 being the newcomer.
title: Best Mobiles Under Rs. 80,000 in India: From Google Pixel 10, OnePlus 13, iPhone 16 Plus and More

description: After installing the October update (KB5066835), USB keyboards and mice, and other input devices were not working in the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE). To fix the bug, Microsoft has announced a new out-of-band (OOB) update with builds 26200.6901 and 26100.6901. The emergency update is distributed automatically via Windows Update, but interested users can download it manually from the Microsoft Update Catalogue if needed.
title: Microsoft Patches Windows 11 Bug After Update Disabled Mouse, Keyboard Input in Recovery Mode

description: Microsoft has made it clear that Copilot will not support erotic or pornographic content. AI chief Mustafa Suleyman told CNBC that “simulated erotica” is not part of Microsoft’s plans, even as rivals like OpenAI and xAI explore adult-oriented features. The company’s focus remains on productivity, creativity, and responsible AI use within its suite of tools and services.
title: No AI Porn: Microsoft AI Chief Mustafa Suleyman Draws Line on Chatbot Capabilities

description: Bitcoin rose above $111,000 (roughly Rs. 97.4 lakh) on Friday, supported by stronger investor sentiment ahead of key US CPI data. Ethereum and major altcoins like Solana, BNB, and XRP also traded higher. Market analysts noted improving macro conditions and renewed optimism after reports of an upcoming US-China presidential meeting. Traders continue to monitor inflation readings closely for hints on future rate decisions.
title: Bitcoin Climbs Above $111,000 as Market Sentiment Improves Ahead of Key US CPI Report

description: AI browsers are redefining web browsing by integrating assistants into the experience. In the last six months, The Browser Company’s Dia, Perplexity’s Comet, and OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas have emerged, each with distinct approaches. While Comet focuses on research efficiency, Atlas offers a task-oriented assistant, and Dia blends design with conversation. All aim to simplify browsing through conversational, AI-powered interfaces.
title: ChatGPT Atlas vs Perplexity’s Comet vs Dia: Which AI Browser Works Best?

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite has reportedly been listed on the Geekbench benchmarking platform with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and a Mali-G615 MC2 GPU. The phone was spotted running on Android 15. It is expected to launch in India later this year as a redesigned version of the CMF Phone 2 Pro. The handset could debut as part of the flagship Nothing Phone 3 lineup, which currently includes the Phone 3, Phone 3a, and Phone 3a Pro.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite CPU, GPU Details and Performance Revealed via Geekbench Listing

description: OnePlus 15 was first showcased in India during the Snapdragon Summit Global Highlights, confirming its imminent launch in the country. Now, a dedicated microsite for the phone has gone live on an e-commerce platform, revealing that the handset will be sold in the country via Amazon and the OnePlus website, among other offline retail channels. The OnePlus 15 will ship in India with Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and the Android 16-based OxygenOS 16. It will also feature a triple-rear camera unit.
title: OnePlus 15 Microsite Confirms Availability via Amazon: Check Expected Price, Features

description: OpenAI’s viral AI video app Sora is expanding beyond iOS, with an Android release expected soon. The app lets users create AI-generated videos starring themselves and others, even without a ChatGPT subscription. According to Sora Head Bill Peebles, the Android rollout may still be invite-only. New features like pet cameos, character stitching, and community channels are also in the works.
title: OpenAI is Bringing Sora to Android Users Soon, to Improve the App’s Social Experience

description: Qualcomm has announced the Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 chipset for Android devices. It sits above the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 in the company's lineup, offering up to 36 percent better CPU performance and up to 59 percent improved GPU performance. As per the company, its latest SoC supports 144Hz Full HD+ displays, up to 200-megapixel camera sensors, and Wi-Fi 6E capabilities.
title: Qualcomm Announces Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 Chipset With Support for 144Hz Displays, Wi-Fi 6E Capabilities

description: Xiaomi TV S Pro Mini LED 2026 series and Redmi Projector 4 Pro were launched in China on Thursday alongside the Redmi K90 series. The new smart TV has a 98-inch display with 4K resolution. It comes with the XM9000 chip. The projector offers native 1080p resolution and has an integrated ToF sensor. The Xiaomi TV S Pro Mini LED 2026 98-inch model costs CNY 7,599 (roughly Rs. 94,000). The Redmi Projector 4 Pro is available with a price tag of CNY 1,499 (roughly Rs. 18,000).
title: Xiaomi TV S Pro Mini LED 2026 Series With 98-Inch Display Launched, Redmi Projector 4 Pro Tags Along

description: Tinder has announced the rollout of Face Check, a new facial verification feature that is claimed to ensure real users and match their profile photos, in the US. As per the company, Face Check leverages a non-reversible, encrypted face map and face vector to help verify photos and prevent duplicate accounts. Coupled with other safety initiatives, it is aimed at reducing impersonation and helping users find other authentic matches on the online dating platform.
title: Tinder Rolls Out Facial Verification Feature to Ensure Authentic Matches, Reduce Impersonation

description: WhatsApp is reportedly testing a new feature for its Android app, which makes managing storage an easier process. As per details shared by a feature tracker, the Meta-owned instant messaging platform is working on a new quick option that lets users monitor and free up storage space directly from the conversation window, eliminating the need to navigate through the app settings. With this feature, they can quickly identify the largest items occupying the device storage on WhatsApp and remove them.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Feature That Lets Users Manage Storage Directly Within the Chat Window

description: From light-hearted romance to intense mythological action and crime thrillers, there’s a lot to add to your watch-list for this weekend. Top releases include Param Sundari, Mahabharat, Kurukshetra, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Oct 20th - Oct 26th): They Call Him OG, Param Sundari, Kurukshetra Season 2, Nobody Wants This, and More

description: The OnePlus Ace 6 is all set to be launched in China next week alongside the OnePlus 15. It is expected to be introduced in India and the global markets as the OnePlus 15R. The company has teased the handset as an “ultra performance” flagship. Here is everything we know about the OnePlus 15R (OnePlus Ace 6), including its expected price in India, features, and specifications.
title: OnePlus 15R (OnePlus Ace 6): Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More
